apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: allow-frontend-checkout
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: shippingservice
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  ingress:

    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: frontend
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: checkoutservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 50051
EOF
